00038 #ifndef OCTREE_H
00039 #define OCTREE_H
00040 
00041 #include <OgreAxisAlignedBox.h>
00042 #include <OgreWireBoundingBox.h>
00043 
00044 #include <list>
00045 
00046 namespace Ogre
00047 {
00048 
00049 class OctreeNode;
00050 
00059 class Octree : public NodeAlloc
00060 {
00061 public:
00062     Octree( Octree * p );
00063     ~Octree();
00064 
00070     void _addNode( OctreeNode * );
00071 
00074     void _removeNode( OctreeNode * );
00075 
00078     int numNodes()
00079     {
00080         return mNumNodes;
00081     };
00082 
00087     AxisAlignedBox mBox;
00088     WireBoundingBox* mWireBoundingBox;
00089     
00092     WireBoundingBox* getWireBoundingBox();
00093 
00096     Vector3 mHalfSize;
00097 
00103     Octree * mChildren[ 2 ][ 2 ][ 2 ];
00104 
00110     bool _isTwiceSize( const AxisAlignedBox &box ) const;
00111 
00118     void _getChildIndexes( const AxisAlignedBox &, int *x, int *y, int *z ) const;
00119 
00124     void _getCullBounds( AxisAlignedBox * ) const;
00125 
00126 
00127     typedef list< OctreeNode * >::type NodeList;
00130     NodeList mNodes;
00131 
00132 protected:
00133 
00136     inline void _ref()
00137     {
00138         mNumNodes++;
00139 
00140         if ( mParent != 0 ) mParent -> _ref();
00141     };
00142 
00145     inline void _unref()
00146     {
00147         mNumNodes--;
00148 
00149         if ( mParent != 0 ) mParent -> _unref();
00150     };
00151 
00153     int mNumNodes;
00154 
00156     Octree * mParent;
00157 
00158 };
00159 
00160 }
